summary: After scammers duped a friend with a hacked Twitter account and a “deal” on a MacBook, I enlisted the help of a fellow threat researcher to trace the criminals’ offline identities.
title: Twitter Scammers Stole $1,000 From My Friend—So I Hunted Them Down
detailed_content: EMBARRASSED, ANGRY, VICTIMIZED. That's just a few of the words my friend uses to describe his recent run-in with a cybercriminal that used a hacked Twitter account to scam people out of hundreds of dollars. Twitter, meanwhile, ignored his pleas for help. That’s when I got involved.
author: BY SELENA LARSON
